channel.title: Vaccinium Corymbosum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccinium Corymbosum on funPlantGenes

item.title: VcHKT1;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VaccDscaff40_211.21 Gene Symbol: VcHKT1;1 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome (Draper) Species: Vaccinium corymbosum Functional Description: we provide evidence that VcHKT1****;1 promotes leaf Na+ exclusion and propose natural variation in VcHKT1****;1 will be valuable for breeding Na+-tolerant blueberry cultivars in the future.
